content: Reviewing #13929, a question popped up about the lemma docstrings in this file: all results in this file are about convexity or strict convexity on a set s - but all doc-strings so far omit s. This PR adds three new doc-strings - should they follow this pattern or should all doc-strings in this file change? (Both seem covered by the documentation style guide; I'd like to have a second opinion on what is preferred.)
